title: Just disenchanted a Lissandra shard I wanted to turn into champ permanent.
body:
Title self explanatory. Plz Rito could you help me? I screwed up, wanted to have lissandra but ended up disenchanting her. Anyway you guys could help me out? 

Best regards
N1C0 GAITAN (EUW)

replies.body: Oops! :X That really sucks to hear.  There is a confirmation window before the fuse is complete, so it's important to be extra careful.  I can't really guarantee that we can help with this, but it won't hurt to put in a ticket.  We do like to look at each case individually, so hit us up.  Hang tight until then!
